1.content: Implement API Access for Business Tier Only
1.details: Create REST API endpoints for AI agents integration (Gemini, ChatGPT, Claude, Ollama). Include invoice CRUD operations, customer management, and analytics queries. Only accessible to Business tier subscribers with API key authentication.

2.content: Add Rate Limiting and DDoS Protection
2.details: Implement comprehensive rate limiting for all API endpoints and user actions. Add DDoS protection with IP blocking, request throttling, and abuse detection. Configure limits per tier (Free: strict, Pro: moderate, Business: generous).

3.details: Create admin role in database with murdochcpm_08@yahoo.com as sole admin account. Implement admin-only features: user management, system settings, billing oversight, analytics dashboard.

4.details: Set up email infrastructure for notifications, invoices, and admin alerts using Resend SMTP. Configure sender domain support@honestinvoice.com and add murdochcpm_08@yahoo.com monitoring for critical events.

5.details: Create comprehensive admin panel with user management, subscription oversight, system metrics, invoice monitoring, and admin tools. Restrict access to admin emails only.

6.details: Implement additional security measures: SQL injection protection, XSS prevention, CSRF tokens, secure headers, input validation, and encryption for sensitive data.

7.details: Create comprehensive API documentation for AI agents integration including authentication, endpoints, rate limits, response formats, and example code for popular AI frameworks.
